name: Simple Moving Average (20)
formula_pseudocode: sma_20_t = mean(close_{t-19}...close_t)
notes_phase3: Baseline MA for short/medium trend context.

name: Simple Moving Average (50)
formula_pseudocode: sma_50_t = mean(close_{t-49}...close_t)
notes_phase3: Longer trend context and support/resistance reference.

name: Exponential Moving Average (12)
formula_pseudocode: ema_12_t = EMA(close, window=12)
notes_phase3: Short-term trend reference used in MACD and fast trend filters.

name: Exponential Moving Average (26)
formula_pseudocode: ema_26_t = EMA(close, window=26)
notes_phase3: Medium-term trend reference used in MACD and swing context.

name: Exponential Moving Average (50)
formula_pseudocode: ema_50_t = EMA(close, window=50)
notes_phase3: Core medium-horizon trend benchmark.

name: MACD (12,26,9)
formula_pseudocode: ema_fast = EMA(close, 12); ema_slow = EMA(close, 26); macd = ema_fast - ema_slow; macd_signal = EMA(macd, 9); macd_hist = macd - macd_signal
notes_phase3: Standard trend/momentum blend; may be output as multiple columns (line, signal, hist) in Phase 5.

name: Price Location vs 20-bar Range
formula_pseudocode: hi = max(high_{t-19}...high_t); lo = min(low_{t-19}...low_t); price_location_20_t = (close_t - lo) / max(hi - lo, epsilon)
notes_phase3: Normalized location in recent range; state thresholds (bottom/mid/top) can be derived in Phase 5.

name: Relative Strength Index (14)
formula_pseudocode: delta = close_t - close_{t-1}; gain = max(delta,0); loss = max(-delta,0); avg_gain = EMA(gain,14); avg_loss = EMA(loss,14); rs = avg_gain / max(avg_loss, epsilon); rsi = 100 - 100/(1+rs)
notes_phase3: Core bounded momentum oscillator; states (oversold/overbought) and cross events will be derived as separate features.

name: Rate of Change (10)
formula_pseudocode: roc_10_t = (close_t - close_{t-10}) / max(|close_{t-10}|, epsilon)
notes_phase3: Basic normalized momentum magnitude.

name: Momentum (10)
formula_pseudocode: mom_10_t = close_t - close_{t-10}
notes_phase3: Simple difference-based momentum.

name: Stochastics %K (14,3)
formula_pseudocode: lowest_low = min(low_{t-13}...low_t); highest_high = max(high_{t-13}...high_t); raw_k = (close_t - lowest_low) / max(highest_high - lowest_low, epsilon); stoch_k_14_3_t = SMA(raw_k,3)
notes_phase3: Bounded oscillator used for overbought/oversold style logic.

name: Stochastics %D (14,3,3)
formula_pseudocode: Compute stoch_k_14_3, then stoch_d_14_3_3_t = SMA(stoch_k_14_3,3)
notes_phase3: Signal line for stochastic oscillator; crosses generate events.

name: True Range
formula_pseudocode: tr_t = max(high_t - low_t, abs(high_t - close_{t-1}), abs(low_t - close_{t-1}))
notes_phase3: Single-bar volatility building block for ATR and other vol measures.

name: Average True Range (14)
formula_pseudocode: Compute true_range; atr_14_t = SMA(true_range,14) or Wilder smoothing equivalent.
notes_phase3: Core volatility metric for position sizing and stop distances; states (low/med/high vol) can be derived.

name: Realized Volatility (20)
formula_pseudocode: r_t = log(close_t / close_{t-1}); realized_vol_20_t = stdev(r_{t-19}...r_t) * sqrt(scale_factor)
notes_phase3: Standard deviation of returns over a window; scale_factor maps bar frequency to daily/annualized if needed.

name: Volume
formula_pseudocode: volume_t = raw traded volume for bar t
notes_phase3: Baseline participation metric.

name: Volume SMA (20)
formula_pseudocode: vol_sma_20_t = mean(volume_{t-19}...volume_t)
notes_phase3: Baseline volume trend; states (low/normal/high volume) can be derived.

name: On-Balance Volume
formula_pseudocode: if close_t > close_{t-1}: obv_t = obv_{t-1} + volume_t; elif close_t < close_{t-1}: obv_t = obv_{t-1} - volume_t; else: obv_t = obv_{t-1}
notes_phase3: Simple volume-flow proxy; often used with trend analysis.

name: VWAP (Intraday)
formula_pseudocode: vwap_t = sum(price_i * volume_i) / sum(volume_i) over current session up to time t
notes_phase3: Core execution benchmark; deviations relative to VWAP are important for intraday strategies.

name: Swing High (5)
formula_pseudocode: swing_high_5_t = 1 if high_t is strictly greater than highs in {t-2..t+2} else 0 (with lookahead in offline calc or delayed confirmation online)
notes_phase3: Basic structural pivot; usually treated as event/marker rather than continuous feature.

name: Swing Low (5)
formula_pseudocode: swing_low_5_t = 1 if low_t is strictly lower than lows in {t-2..t+2} else 0 (with lookahead in offline calc or delayed confirmation online)
notes_phase3: Basic structural pivot; used to form swings and higher-level structure states.

name: Range High (20)
formula_pseudocode: range_high_20_t = max(high_{t-19}...high_t)
notes_phase3: Rolling resistance reference.

name: Range Low (20)
formula_pseudocode: range_low_20_t = min(low_{t-19}...low_t)
notes_phase3: Rolling support reference.

name: Candle Body % of Range
formula_pseudocode: full_range = max(high_t - low_t, epsilon); body_size = abs(close_t - open_t); candle_body_pct_t = body_size / full_range
notes_phase3: Basic candle feature; state bins (small/medium/large body) can be derived.

name: Upper Wick % of Range
formula_pseudocode: full_range = max(high_t - low_t, epsilon); upper_wick = max(high_t - max(open_t, close_t), 0); upper_wick_pct_t = upper_wick / full_range
notes_phase3: Basic candle feature; high upper wick suggests rejection from above.

name: Lower Wick % of Range
formula_pseudocode: full_range = max(high_t - low_t, epsilon); lower_wick = max(min(open_t, close_t) - low_t, 0); lower_wick_pct_t = lower_wick / full_range
notes_phase3: Basic candle feature; long lower wick suggests rejection from below.

name: Close Position in Range
formula_pseudocode: close_pos_pct_t = (close_t - low_t) / max(high_t - low_t, epsilon)
notes_phase3: Normalized close location [0,1]; helpful for strong/weak close detection.

name: P/E (TTM)
formula_pseudocode: pe_ttm_t = price_t / max(eps_ttm_t, epsilon)
notes_phase3: Core valuation metric; state bins (cheap/fair/expensive) can be derived.

name: Price/Book
formula_pseudocode: pb_t = price_t / max(book_value_per_share_t, epsilon)
notes_phase3: Balance-sheet focused valuation; subject to accounting caveats.

name: Dividend Yield
formula_pseudocode: div_yield_t = dividends_per_share_annualized_t / max(price_t, epsilon)
notes_phase3: Income-focused metric; may be used in factor models.

name: Earnings Event Flag
formula_pseudocode: earnings_flag_t = 1 if current_date in [earnings_date - window_pre, earnings_date + window_post] else 0
notes_phase3: Marks the neighborhood around earnings announcements; used for event studies and volatility filters.

name: Dividend Event Flag
formula_pseudocode: dividend_flag_t = 1 if current_date in [dividend_ex_date - window_pre, dividend_ex_date + window_post] else 0
notes_phase3: Flags dates around dividend ex-date/payment; relevant for gap behavior.

name: Split Event Flag
formula_pseudocode: split_flag_t = 1 if current_date in [split_date - window_pre, split_date + window_post] else 0
notes_phase3: Flags dates around stock splits/reverse splits; structural price changes and liquidity shifts.

name: Intraday Drawdown
formula_pseudocode: dd_intraday_t = (price_t - intraday_peak_price_t) / max(intraday_peak_price_t, epsilon)
notes_phase3: Real-time drawdown vs intraday peak; states and breach events will be derived.

name: Trailing Drawdown (20)
formula_pseudocode: peak_20 = max(price_{t-19}...price_t); dd_trailing_20_t = (price_t - peak_20) / max(peak_20, epsilon)
notes_phase3: Short-horizon drawdown measure used in risk control logic.

name: Market Beta (60)
formula_pseudocode: Compute asset and benchmark returns; beta_market_60_t = cov(asset_returns, benchmark_returns) / max(var(benchmark_returns), epsilon) over 60 bars.
notes_phase3: Rolling systematic risk measure vs benchmark index.

name: Gross Exposure
formula_pseudocode: gross_exposure_t = sum_i |notional_i_t|
notes_phase3: Total absolute exposure across positions; used for leverage and risk budgets.

name: Net Exposure
formula_pseudocode: net_exposure_t = sum_i notional_i_t
notes_phase3: Directional exposure; used for hedging and regime alignment checks.
